alert.note: Alert for Jack; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 7:00PM CDT until April 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wise County in north central Texas... Southeastern Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chico, or 9 miles northwest of Bridgeport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Bridgeport, Briar, Pecan Acres, Alvord, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Chico, Paradise, Cottondale, Boonsville, Rhome, Runaway Bay, Newark and Lake Bridgeport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
